body_html:
I can run git clone https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl locally, but in bazel that didn't work.

Maybe bazel didn't honor the proxy env vars when download the deps of deps. (tensorflow -> grpc -> boringssl)

body:
I can run git clone https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl locally, but in bazel that didn't work.

Maybe bazel didn't honor the proxy env vars when download the deps of deps. (tensorflow -> grpc -> boringssl)
